text: Kristina Petrunova (; born 15 December 1991) is a Bulgarian footballer who plays as a midfielder. She has been a member of the Bulgaria women's national team. ==References== Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Women's association football midfielders Category:Bulgarian women's footballers Category:Bulgaria women's international footballers Category:Gintra Universitetas players Category:Bulgarian expatriate footballers Category:Bulgarian expatriate sportspeople in North Macedonia Category:Expatriate footballers in North Macedonia Category:Bulgarian expatriate sportspeople in Lithuania Category:Expatriate women's footballers in Lithuania
title: Kristina Petrunova
